config.siddhiApp: @App:name('APIMTopAppCreatorsSiddhi') @primaryKey('APPLICATION_ID') @store(type="rdbms" , datasource="AM_DB") define table AM_APPLICATION(APPLICATION_ID int,NAME string,SUBSCRIBER_ID int,APPLICATION_TIER string,CALLBACK_URL string,DESCRIPTION string,APPLICATION_STATUS string,GROUP_ID string,CREATED_BY string,CREATED_TIME string,UPDATED_BY string,UPDATED_TIME string,UUID string,TOKEN_TYPE string);

queryData.query: from AM_APPLICATION select CREATED_BY,count(APPLICATION_ID) AS count group by CREATED_BY order by count desc limit {{limit}};
